channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 09:18 Alarm lifted in Kyiv. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游릭 09:18 Alarm lifted in Kyiv. Follow further messages. #Kyiv_city This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 07:01 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Please note that the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 游리 07:01 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Please note that the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
